content.name: Cine Quiz
content.description: Are you a Kollywood freak? Then this event is for you where we will be shooting questions on movies and songs.
rules: Round 1 - It's a Paper pen quiz round in which the participants scoring the stipulated mark for the given questions will be moving to round 2.
Round 2-  Itâ€™s about uncovering the songs through beats and rhythms. The eligible teams will be moving to round 3
Round 3- Finale round where the team should find film through pictures & plots. The team acquiring the max marks will be rewarded.
